text: Porridge on the plainer side but the ingredients are fresh and definitely more than Hougang SHK. The youtiao is thumbs up.

I’ve tried it a few times in-store, and it was tasty and delicious with generous portions. Today, I ordered from Foodpanda, and the porridge was packed in a warmer bag, while the condiments were individually packed. Very impressive!
Hidden gem. One of the better porridge in Singapore. Trust me. No regrets. Big portion, well cooked.
Really good hearty porridge with lots of ingredients. With a nice piece of fresh non oily you tiao too! Very polite service from the young lady serving counter too.

Saw all the 5-stars review here and decided to order this for myself and daughter. It’s either the cook is having a bad day or I have a lousy taste bud compared to the people who provided the reviews here, the porridge is super salty and the frog sauce was even saltier. The sauce is not the typical frog sauce but just Ma Yu oil which is oily and salty. To be fair, the you tiao was ok.

First and last purchase from this place.
